creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, letterpress and a digital image of IMF, WTO, and World Bank personified as monsters, printed in offset lithography on blue wove paper covers; 40 pp.
title: A simple pamphlet containing a culmination of information regarding why you might want to consider resisting the World Bank, IMF, and WTO by demonstrating on April 16, 2000.
